column1: #Text=The polycrystalline samples of Hg1212 and Hg1223 were synthesized with a cubic–anvil-type high-pressure apparatus (180 ton press, TRY Eng. Co.).

#Text=Mixtures of HgO, BaO2 CaO, and CuO/Cu, or mixtures of HgO and the precursor (prepared from BaCO3, CaO and CuO at 950 °C in a flowing high-purity oxygen gas) were placed into a cylindrical gold capsule and sintered for 10–30 min at 805–850 °C under a pressure of 2 GPa.
#Text=To control the hole doping level, we have optimized the starting material, sintering condition, and annealing condition for each sample.
